description: This file 'UtilsString.h' contains utility functions and templates for string manipulation, including case-insensitive comparisons, substring searches, trimming, case conversion, base64 encoding, and whitespace removal, within the 'Utils::String' namespace.

classes.name: loc_equal
classes.description: A template struct for locale-aware character comparison, used for case-insensitive comparisons.

methods.name: int find_substr_ci(const T & string,const T & substring,const std::locale & loc=std::locale ())
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search for a substring within a string, returns the position or -1 if not found.

methods.name: bool contains(const T & string,const T & substring,const std::locale & loc=std::locale ())
methods.description: Checks if a string contains a specified substring in a case-insensitive manner.

methods.name: bool equal(const T & string,const T & string2,const std::locale & loc=std::locale ())
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive comparison between two strings.

methods.name: void ltrim(std::string & s)
methods.description: Trims whitespace characters from the beginning of a string.

methods.name: void rtrim(std::string & s)
methods.description: Trims whitespace characters from the end of a string.

methods.name: void trim(std::string & s)
methods.description: Trims whitespace characters from both ends of a string.

methods.name: void toUpper(std::string & s)
methods.description: Converts all characters in a string to uppercase.

methods.name: void toLower(std::string & s)
methods.description: Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.

methods.name: bool stringContains(const std::string & s1,const char * s2)
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive check for substring presence within another string.

methods.name: void split(std::vector<std::string> & stringList,std::string & s,std::string delimiters)
methods.description: Splits a string into a vector of substrings based on delimiters.

methods.name: void imageEncoder(const uint8_t object[],const uint32_t length,const bool padding,string & result)
methods.description: Encodes a byte array into Base64 format.

methods.name: bool removeExtraWhitespaces(string & in_str,string & out_str)
methods.description: Removes extra spaces from an input string, producing a cleaned output string.
